alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 6:10PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BRIEF HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS THIS EVENING... Scattered moderate to heavy showers of snow showers will move across parts of northeast Minnesota and far northwest Wisconsin this evening. These showers may result in quickly reduced visibilities around a half mile at times. Expect rapidly changing conditions over short distances. Most will only see light snow accumulation but there could be localized amounts around an inch. As temperatures cool this evening, more of the snow will stick to roadways and could create slick conditions. Be prepared to slow down and allow plenty of distance between vehicles when visibilities are reduced and roads are snow covered.
